outcome: A mysterious map suggesting external cyber-espionage surfaces, initiating an investigation.

events.description: Security analysts discover a coded map in Halden's files suggesting foreign cyber-espionage involvement.
The Council forms an investigatory committee to probe possible external interference, alarming citizens.
Initial analysis points towards a foreign actor known for digital infiltration, increasing tension.
Public media reports about potential foreign involvement in Stenograd's system failure, sparking fear.
